sections.heading: 01|Division of state highway patrol
sections.text: Effective:April 3, 2023Latest Legislation:House Bill 23 - 134th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThere is hereby created in the department of public safety a division of state highway patrol which shall be administered by a superintendent of the state

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not limit the powers granted to the superintendent by this division.
sections.text: the Revised Code do not limit the powers granted to the superintendent by this division.

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not supersede, limit, or suspend any law relative to the regulation of motor transportation upon the public highways of the state by the public utilities commission
sections.text: In addition to the powers and duties of the state highway patrol set forth in section5503.02of the Revised Code, a
